name: @klevu/core
description: Typescript SDK that simplifies development on Klevu backend.

scripts.build: rm -fr dist/* && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && ./fixup
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && (typedoc --entryDocument '' --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs src/index.ts || true) && node split_docs.js
scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx jest src --coverage && npm run qoc

author: Klevu
